text: The songs on this CD tell many sad stories from Irish history.
trans: 這張CD裡的歌曲訴說著許多愛爾蘭歷史上的憂傷故事。

text: During the day, she sits in front of the computer and writes stories for children.
trans: 白天裡，她坐在電腦前為小朋友寫故事。

text: Mr. Thomas gets a lot of cards and flowers from his students on Teacher’s Day every year; he is really a popular teacher.
trans: Thomas先生每年教師節收到很多學生送的卡片和花；他真是個受歡迎的老師。

text: I like bread very much and I usually buy my breakfast at the bakery near my home.
trans: 我很喜歡麵包，而且我通常在我家附近的麵包店買早餐。

text: Helen usually orders a fish, a vegetable soup and a cup of coffee for lunch at Yummy Restaurant.
trans: Helen通常在Yummy餐廳點魚、蔬菜湯和一杯咖啡當午餐。

text: She has many tests every day, but she does not even want to look at her books.
trans: 她每天有許多考試，但是她甚至連書都不想看一眼。

text: She is a shopkeeper and she works in her shoe store for twelve hours every day.
trans: 她是店老闆，每天在她的鞋店裡工作十二個小時。

text: Spring is a wonderful season because it is usually warm and sunny.
trans: 春天是個很棒的季節，因為它通常溫暖而晴朗。

text: On cold days, my cat loves to lie on the couch because it is warm and comfortable.
trans: 天冷的時候，我的貓喜歡躺在沙發椅上，因為那樣既溫暖又舒適。

text: To children, play is very important because they learn when they play.
trans: 對小朋友們來說，玩耍是很重要的，因為他們在玩耍的時候學習。

text: What comes to your mind when you hear the word “twins”?
trans: 當你聽到「雙胞胎」這個詞的時候，你心裡想到什麼？

text: Don’t forget to show me some pictures when you come back.
trans: 你回來的時候，別忘記給我看一些照片。

text: Maybe I’ll have a boyfriend when you see me next time!
trans: 也許你下次看到我時，我已有男朋友了。

text: There are several mistakes in your workbook. You should correct them before you go to bed.
trans: 你的作業簿裡有好幾個錯誤。你應該在上床睡覺前將它們訂正。

text: We could have lunch somewhere near the train station before we go to the museum.
trans: 我們去博物館之前，可以在火車站附近某個地方吃午餐。

text: She can only tell herself that things will get better after she starts senior high school.
trans: 她只能告訴自己，等她上高中之後，事情都會好轉。

text: I’ll help you find it after I put all the food in the refrigerator.
trans: 等我把食物放進冰箱之後，我會幫你把它找出來。

text: They have to stay in Kaohsiung for a long time, until their new house is built.
trans: 他們必須在高雄待很久，直到他們的新房子蓋好。

text: She knows she will be really happy if she can be a student again.
trans: 她知道假如她可以再當學生的話，她會真的很開心。

text: My mom will be worried if I’m not home before dinner.
trans: 假如我晚餐之前沒到家的話，我媽會很擔心。

text: If Frank comes to the office tonight, give this package to him.
trans: 假如法蘭克今晚到辦公室來，把這個包裹給他。

text: If you’re not in a hurry, we can still go after my car is fixed.
trans: 假如你不趕時間，等我的車修好之後我們還是可以去。

text: If he orders one main dish and one soup, how much does he need to pay?
trans: 假如他點了一道主菜和一道湯，他需要付多少錢？

text: If I finish my homework before eight o’clock, my parents will let me watch TV for an hour.
trans: 假如我在八點以前做完功課，我父母親會讓我看一個小時電視。

text: If, in the future, any of your Internet friends ask you to meet with them, you are welcome to invite them to have dinner with us in our house.
trans: 假如未來你的任何網友要你和他們碰面，歡迎你邀請他們到家裡來和我們吃晚餐。

text: If we want to win the ball game, we’ll have to practice long hours every day.
trans: 假如我們想要贏這場球賽，我們每天得練習很長時間。

text: The business at Linda’s supermarket is very good, so she makes a lot of money.
trans: Linda的超市生意很好，所以她賺了很多錢。

text: The Lins do not have a dining room in their small apartment, so they always have meals in the living room.
trans: 姓林的一家人住的小公寓裡沒有飯廳，所以他們總是在客廳裡用餐。

text: The weather there is nice and warm all the year, so trees and flowers grow well in all seasons.
trans: 那裡的天氣整年都很好很溫暖，所以樹木和花朵四季都長得很好。

text: We don’t have enough toys for each child, so they will have to share them with each other.
trans: 我們沒有足夠的玩具給每個小孩，所以他們必須彼此分享。

text: You can spend a quiet day in the tea houses here to get away from your busy life.
trans: 你可以在這裡的茶館裡度過安靜的一天，從你的忙碌生活中逃離。

text: He knows a lot about animals, although he does not spend much time with our dogs and birds.
trans: 他知道很多關於動物的事，不過他並沒有花很多時間和我們的狗還有鳥在一起。

text: One of the books on the desk is about the famous writers of our country.
trans: 書桌上其中一本書是關於我國的知名作家。

text: He is looking for a place to eat and have fun with his friends on Saturday night.
trans: 他在找一個星期六晚上可以和朋友吃飯玩耍的地方。

text: Blue Bridge is full of different places for city fun – theaters, restaurants, museums, shopping centers. Also, don’t miss its famous night markets.
trans: Blue Bridge這裡到處都是不同的城市娛樂場所 – 電影院、餐廳、博物館、購物中心。還有，別錯過它著名的夜市。

text: Oh! I forgot today’s Mary’s birthday! What should I do? The stores are all closed!
trans: 喔！我忘了今天是Mary的生日！我該怎麼辦？店都打烊了！

text: Stella is a baseball fan. She has more than one hundred pictures of famous baseball players.
trans: Stella是個棒球迷。她有超過一百張知名棒球選手的照片。

text: Our dog always hides food under the ground. She digs it out when she needs it.
trans: 我們的狗總是把食物藏在地下。她需要的時候才把它挖出來。

text: Many people don’t use their real names on the Internet. Some of them even make up stories about themselves.
trans: 許多人在網路上並不使用他們的真實名字。其中有些人甚至編造關於他們自己的故事。

text: Different kinds of bears have different colors, but most elephants are gray.
trans: 不同的熊有不同的顏色，但是大部份的象都是灰色的。

text: Tina had hamburgers for lunch every day last week.
trans: Tina上週每天午餐都吃漢堡。

text: Although Mrs. Brown told her son to hurry up, the little boy still walked slowly behind her.
trans: 雖然Brown太太告訴他兒子動作快一點，這個小男孩還是慢慢地走在她後面。

text: He liked to help others, and everyone around him liked him very much.
trans: 他喜歡幫助別人，而他周遭的每個人都很喜歡他。

text: My family moved here from England three months ago.
trans: 我們家三個月前從英國搬來這裡。

text: The man did not listen and kept asking for money.
trans: 那個人不聽話，繼續要錢。

text: On Friday morning, Mrs. Jones bought a present for her boss on her way to work.
trans: 星期五早上，Jones太太在上班途中買了一份禮物給她的老闆。

text: She did not have any close friends before, and she always felt lost and lonely.
trans: 她以前沒有任何好朋友，她總是感到失落和寂寞。

text: It was a present from my father for my thirteenth birthday.
trans: 那是我十三歲生日時父親送給我的禮物。

text: Did you have a good time at Mr. Moore’s house tonight?
trans: 你今晚在Moore先生家玩得開心嗎？

text: Most of the jobs did not pay well, but she tried her best in all of them and learned a lot.
trans: 這些工作大多待遇不好，但她都全力以赴並且學到很多。

text: The test was very difficult. Only five students in my class passed it.
trans: 這次考試很難。我班上只有五個學生及格。

text: Katie wrote a letter to her English teacher and got a reply from him.
trans: Katie寫了一封信給她的英文老師並收到了回覆。

text: My brother doesn’t live with us. He moved out after he got married.
trans: 我哥哥沒有和我們住在一起。他結婚之後就搬出去了。

text: In fact, she enjoyed studying during her first two years of high school and always got high grades on tests.
trans: 事實上，她中學的前兩年很愛唸書，而且考試總是得高分。

text: She took the train to the beach and met her friends there at 3:00 p.m.
trans: 她搭火車到海邊，並於下午三點時與朋友們在那裡碰面。

text: Class 2A of St. John High School went to the History Museum yesterday and spent all morning there.
trans: St. John高中的二年A班昨天去歷史博物館，並且在那裡過了一整個早上。

text: Last week she and her brother came to Kaohsiung to stay with their grandparents.
trans: 上週她和她弟弟來高雄和爺爺奶奶同住。

text: We could just stay in our room watching TV and playing cards.
trans: 我們可以只待在房間看電視和玩牌。

text: When the teacher was not in the classroom, the students talked loudly and made a lot of noise.
trans: 當老師不在教室，學生們大聲講話並且發出許多噪音。

text: She gave the mouse food and water every day and found that the mouse was in fact not dirty.
trans: 她每天都給老鼠食物和水，發現老鼠事實上並不髒。

text: Mom and Dad called several times from Tainan when you went to the movies last night.
trans: 你昨晚去看電影時，媽媽和爸爸從臺南打了好幾通電話來。

text: Her father took good care of the six children in her family after her mother died young.
trans: 她媽媽很年輕就過世了，之後她父親妥善地照顧家裡的六個小孩。

text: Every night from my window I could see bright stars in the sky, and I would go to sleep with the smell of grass.
trans: 每天晚上我可以從我的窗戶看到天上明亮的星星，而且我可以在草香之中入睡。

text: The next few days, they had breakfast in a coffee shop and ate hamburgers in a fast-food restaurant.
trans: 接下來幾天，他們在一家咖啡廳吃早餐，並且在速食餐廳吃漢堡。

text: She is going to join her friend’s band in the summer musical festival.
trans: 她要在夏季音樂節時加入她朋友的樂隊。

text: If we take the 2:00 train, we’ll arrive in Taichung at 4:30.
trans: 假如我們搭兩點的火車，我們會在四點半到達台中。

text: I’m going to the library with my classmates and will be home at five.
trans: 我要和我同學去圖書館，五點鐘會到家。

text: My parents will be waiting for me there later.
trans: 我的父母親稍後會在那裡等我。

text: What will the weather be like tomorrow in the south of Fishland?
trans: 明天Fishland南部的天氣如何？

text: Aren’t you going to have dinner with your girlfriend tonight?
trans: 你今晚不和你的女朋友共進晚餐嗎？

text: Are you going to stay in bed all day long?
trans: 你要一整天都待在床上嗎？

text: I’m excited because I’m going on a five-day vacation this week with Mark and Daniel.
trans: 我很興奮，因為我這星期要和Mark以及Daniel去度假五天。

text: Albert is going to drive to the History Museum from the airport, but he needs to go to the gas station first.
trans: Albert要從機場開車到歷史博物館，但他必須先去加油站。

text: He is cleaning the house because some of his friends are coming for dinner.
trans: 他在打掃房子，因為有幾個朋友要過來吃晚餐。

text: The ball game will be on TV tomorrow at six in the morning.
trans: 比賽將於明天早上六點在電視上轉播。

text: Mr. Yang has worked in this factory since 1968.
trans: 楊先生從一九六八年就在這家工廠上班了。

text: Many of my classmates have had the experience of taking an airplane, but I haven’t.
trans: 我有許多同學有搭飛機的經驗，但我還沒有。

text: There are more and more cars in our city, so parking has become a serious problem.
trans: 我們的城市裡車子愈來愈多，所以停車已經成了嚴重的問題。

text: My three-year-old brother watched a magic show on TV last month. Since then he has always believed that rabbits may come out of hats.
trans: 我的三歲小弟上個月在電視上看了一場魔術表演。從那時候起他一直相信帽子裡會跑出兔子來。

text: School is not a problem for me, and I have made some friends in my class.
trans: 上學對我不成問題，而且我已經在班上交了一些朋友。

text: I’ve never been there, either. But I’m sure we’re going to have fun in this trip.
trans: 我也從來沒去過那兒。但我相信我們這趟旅途會玩得開心。

text: What? It’s Mother’s Day? Oh, I have been so busy these days. I haven’t bought a present for my mom!
trans: 什麼？是母親節？喔，我這陣子實在很忙。我還沒有買禮物給媽媽！

text: Your sister hasn’t come back yet. She never comes home later than five-thirty.
trans: 你妹妹還沒回來。她從來不會超過五點半回家。

text: Uncle Jim does not paint for money; he has never sold any of his pictures.
trans: Jim叔叔作畫不是為了錢；他從來不曾出售他的畫作。

text: Mr. and Mrs. Jones are crazy about dolls. In the past three years, they have collected more than one hundred dolls.
trans: Jones夫婦對洋娃娃很著迷。過去三年來，他們已經收集了超過一百個洋娃娃。

text: You’ve had the same food for breakfast for one week. Do you want something different for a change?
trans: 你一個星期以來早餐都吃一樣的食物，你想換換不同口味嗎？

text: It’s the most interesting fish I’ve ever seen. It looks like it has a big head but doesn’t have a body.
trans: 這是我看過最有趣的魚。它看起來好像有個大頭卻沒有身體。

text: This is the trip I’ve dreamed of for so long. Now it’s going to come true.
trans: 這趟旅行是我長久以來的夢想。如今它就要成真了。

text: It’s been a long time since you wrote me a letter.
trans: 你已經很久沒有寫信給我了。

text: So far I have studied very hard in every subject.
trans: 到目前為止，我每一科都很用功。

text: If you want to be successful in this job, you need to work harder than other people.
trans: 如果你想把這份工作做得成功，你需要比其他人更努力。

text: I hate to wear the same clothes as everyone else to school every day.
trans: 我討厭每天和別人穿一樣的衣服去學校。

text: He knows a lot about bicycles, but never likes to ride bikes as much as I do.
trans: 他懂很多腳踏車的事，但是從來不像我這樣愛騎腳踏車。

text: To me, my mother is the most beautiful woman in the world.
trans: 對我來說，我媽是全世界最漂亮的女人。

text: My younger sister likes lions best of all animals.
trans: 所有的動物裡頭，我妹妹最喜歡獅子。

text: Which sweater looks better on me, the red one or the blue one?
trans: 我穿哪一件毛衣比較好看，是紅的還是藍的？

text: More than 3,000 presents are ready for you at www.lastmoment5.com.
trans: 在www.lastmoment5.com 有超過三千種禮物等你去挑喔。

text: Lucy looks prettier in pants than in a dress.
trans: Lucy穿褲子比穿洋裝好看。

text: Of all the subjects, math is the most useful to me.
trans: 所有的科目裡面，數學對我最有用處。

text: He really hopes that his daughter can love her family as much as she loves the pop singer.
trans: 他真的希望女兒能夠如同愛那個流行歌手一樣地愛家人。

text: There are usually some good programs on weekends.
trans: 週末通常有些好節目。

text: There are so many interesting fishes and sea animals in the water zoo.
trans: 在水中動物園裡有這麼多有趣的魚和海底動物。

text: There’s a supermarket just one block away from here. Let’s go there and buy some juice.
trans: 有一家超市離這裡只有一個街區遠。我們去那裡買點果汁吧。

text: How many people were there in the office when the fire happened?
trans: 火災發生時，辦公室裡有多少人呢？

text: There are many trees in the park. Most of them are over fifty years old.
trans: 公園裡有許多樹木。它們大部份都超過五十歲了。

text: There will be a welcome party next week for the new students.
trans: 下週將會有一場歡迎新生的派對。

text: Their sad faces made her decide to help, so she left school and started to work at the age of fifteen.
trans: 他們悲傷的表情使得她決定幫忙，所以她離開了學校，十五歲就開始工作。

text: If you keep being late, I will make you dump garbage for the class for one month.
trans: 假如你一直遲到下去，我會要你為本班倒垃圾一個月。

text: What made Bill and Jill think that Taiwan was just like America?
trans: 什麼原因讓Bill和Jill認為台灣就像美國一樣？

text: Let’s take a look at today’s TV schedule.
trans: 我們來看一看今天的電視時間表。

text: Let me get my bicycle. I’ll ride around and look for her.
trans: 我去騎我的腳踏車。我會到處繞一繞找尋她。

text: I’m glad that you let me know about your problem.
trans: 很高興你讓我知道你的問題。

text: They are wonderful friends, and their letters have made her feel much better.
trans: 他們是很棒的朋友，而且他們的信讓她覺得好多了。

text: I always hear people say good things about the restaurant.
trans: 我總是聽到人們說這家餐廳有多好。

text: The students got excited when they saw their favorite movie star eating at the next table.
trans: 當學生們看到他們最喜愛的電影明星在隔壁桌吃飯，都感到很興奮。

text: She made my mom stand between my two brothers, and made my dad walk to the back and then to the front.
trans: 她要我媽站在我的兩個兄弟之間，然後要我爸走到後面又走來前面。

text: When I was walking along the river, I saw some fish jumping out of the water.
trans: 當我沿著河邊走時，我看到一些魚跳出水面。

text: This TV program helps us get some knowledge of other countries. I’ve learned a lot from it.
trans: 這個電視節目幫助我們獲得一些其他國家的知識。我從裡面學到很多。

text: Asking questions helps Henna learn more and better.
trans: 提出問題有助於Henna學得更多而且更好。

text: The weather turned bad in the afternoon when we got to the island.
trans: 下午當我們到達島上，天氣變壞了。

text: Sally got angry because her little brother turned off the fan when she was still working on the computer.
trans: Sally很生氣，因為她還在用電腦時，她弟弟就把電風扇關掉。

text: Last year, Dad got very sick and had to stay in the hospital.
trans: 去年，爸爸病得很重，必須住院。

text: Mom became very busy running between the house and the hospital.
trans: 媽媽變得很忙，在家和醫院之間奔走。

text: Summer is the best season to see the trees and flowers.
trans: 夏天是觀賞樹木和花朵的最佳季節。

text: I forgot to bring my cell phone, and there was no public phone around.
trans: 我忘記帶手機，而且附近也沒有公共電話。

text: She got a bad grade and was afraid to go home.
trans: 她成績不好，不敢回家。

text: Her teacher asked each student to take care of an animal and learn to get along with it.
trans: 她的老師要求每一位學生要照顧一種動物，並且學會與之相處。

text: The price of the house is too high. My parents do not have enough money to buy it.
trans: 這棟房子價格太高。我的父母親沒有足夠的錢可以買。

text: We pick up your children at school and give them a safe place to play, do homework, and learn after school.
trans: 我們到學校接您的小孩，並且在放學後給他們一個安全的地方可以玩耍，做功課和學習。

text: Tony’s biggest dream is to be a singer. He has always wanted to sing on TV since he was a child.
trans: Tony最大的夢想就是當歌手。他從小就一直想在電視上演唱。

text: My sister told me to clean up our room. She did not want to see any garbage on the floor.
trans: 我妹妹告訴我要把我們的房間整理乾淨。她不想看到地板上有垃圾。

text: When mom asked you not to play computer games all day long, what did you do?
trans: 當媽媽告訴你不要一整天打電腦遊戲時，你做了什麼？

text: Learning foreign languages helps me to know more about other countries.
trans: 學習外國語言幫助我知道更多關於其他國家的事。

text: Mom loves talking and reading with us, but she hates cooking and cleaning.
trans: 媽媽喜歡和我們一起聊天、看書，但是她討厭煮飯和打掃。

text: Working all day on the computer makes my eyes really tired.
trans: 一整天用電腦工作使我的眼睛很疲勞。

text: Try to practice speaking English with your teachers and classmates.
trans: 想辦法和你的老師以及同學們練習說英語。

text: Many of the fans enjoy getting together to share their love for the stars.
trans: 許多粉絲喜歡聚在一起分享他們對明星的愛慕。

text: I’m sure you can learn a lot from doing so.
trans: 我相信你可以藉著這樣做而學到很多。

text: Rover did not like the idea of taking pictures, so he ran into his doghouse.
trans: Rover不喜歡照相這個主意，所以牠跑進牠的狗屋裡。

text: Before they left America, Bill and Jill tried to learn about Chinese food and Taiwanese ways of doing things.
trans: 在離開美國之前，Bill和Jill設法學到關於中國菜和臺灣人的做事方式。

text: Ms. Smith is excellent at telling stories, so all of her students enjoy story time in her class very much.
trans: 史密斯女士善於講故事，所以她的學生們都非常喜歡她課堂上的故事時間。

text: Mom is always busy writing and taking care of us, but she is always smiling.
trans: 媽媽總是忙著寫作和照顧我們，但她總是面帶微笑。

text: My grandpa is good at cooking and he always prepares a big meal for us when we visit him.
trans: 我祖父擅長烹飪，當我們去看他時，他總是為我們準備一頓大餐。

text: When Marcy was a little girl, her parents were always worried about not having enough money.
trans: 當瑪西還是個小女孩時，她的父母親們總是擔心沒有足夠的錢。

text: I’ve always dreamed about having a room with lots of toys.
trans: 我總是夢到擁有一個有很多玩具的房間。

text: In my family, my sister is the only person who loves chocolate.
trans: 我妹妹是我的家人之中唯一喜愛巧克力的。

text: I like to read comic books that make me laugh.
trans: 我喜歡看會讓我大笑的漫畫書。

text: Today will be the last sunny day we have this week.
trans: 今天將是本星期最後一個晴朗的日子。

text: He was a man who loved his family and his life a lot.
trans: 他是一個深愛家人和妻子的男人。

text: Fans who do not want to miss the concert should get to the park as early as possible.
trans: 不想錯過這場演唱會的歌迷們應該儘可能早點到達公園。

text: The movie is about a true story that happened in Korea in 1945.
trans: 這部電影是關於1945年發生在韓國的真實故事。

text: They talked to each other in a language I didn’t understand.
trans: 他們用一種我不懂的語言彼此交談。

text: He cannot understand why a man who sings crazy songs can be so important to his daughter.
trans: 他不瞭解為什麼一個唱瘋狂歌曲的人會對他的女兒如此重要。

text: Heartland is a beautiful town in which cars and motorcycles are not allowed.
trans: Heartland是一個美麗的城鎮，鎮上不允許開車和騎摩托車。

text: What she wants most now is to go back to school.
trans: 現在她最想要的就是回到學校。

text: What dogs want most is to have a real home and family.
trans: 狗最想要的就是真正的家和家人。

text: They learned to do things the way Taiwanese people do.
trans: 他們學會了用臺灣人的方式做事情。

text: People who want to have a vacation there will have to change their plans.
trans: 想去那個地方度假的人將必須改變計畫。

text: A new road is going to be built in town because traffic is getting busier and busier.
trans: 因為交通愈來愈繁忙，鎮上將要興建一條新的道路。

text: On her way to the park, she was stopped by a man who was biting his fingernails.
trans: 在她去公園的路上，她被一個咬著手指甲的男人攔下來。

text: Most of Jeff’s best books were written when he was sick and poor.
trans: Jeff最好的書大多是在他貧病交迫的時候所寫的。

text: She enjoys writing a lot and also gets paid for it.
trans: 她很喜歡寫作，也因此獲得報酬。

text: Mom called back and told me that Dad was hit by a car on his way to look for me.
trans: 媽媽打電話回來，告訴我爸爸在找我的途中被車撞到。

text: Dad’s left leg was badly hurt, and he stayed in the hospital for several days.
trans: 爸爸的左腿傷勢嚴重，而且他在醫院裡住了好幾天。

text: All the packages are carefully checked at the airport to keep everyone safe.
trans: 在機場，所有的包裹都經過仔細檢查，以維護所有人的安全。

text: She was seriously hurt when the house fell down.
trans: 當房子倒塌時，她受了重傷。

text: His comic books were enjoyed by his family but never shown to the people outside the farm.
trans: 他的漫畫書受到全家人的喜愛，但卻從未給農場以外的人看過。

text: Now the pictures can be seen at the City Art Center for one month.
trans: 如今這些圖畫在市立藝術中心展出一個月。

text: It was very windy this morning. My hat was blown away when I was walking on the street.
trans: 今天早上風很大。我走在街上時帽子被吹走。

text: Last Sunday, at about 4 o’clock in the morning, my family and I were woken up by our dog.
trans: 上個星期天，大約早上四點鐘時，我的家人和我被我們的狗叫醒。

text: In my dream, I was taken to a room by three strange-looking people.
trans: 在夢中，我被三個長相怪異的人帶進一個房間。

text: The picture was taken in our garden by my cousin.
trans: 這張照片是我表哥在我們的花園裡拍的。

text: The doctor said the woman might become blind because her eyes were badly hurt.
trans: 醫生說因為這個女人的眼睛受傷嚴重，她可能會失明。

text: Peter and his sister are asked to call their parents if they have to go home late.
trans: Peter和他妹妹受到要求：假如他們必須晚回家的話，要打電話給父母。

text: All of the gift boxes are already put under the Christmas tree.
trans: 所有的禮物盒都已經擺在聖誕樹下。

text: She got hurt when she slammed the door.
trans: 她用力關門的時候受了傷。

text: The city’s famous bright sun cannot be seen today because the rain is going to last all day.
trans: 今天看不到這城市出了名的豔陽，因為雨將會持續一整天。

text: When I got up this morning, I was so surprised to find a new watch on my desk.
trans: 今天早上起床時，我很驚訝地發現書桌上有一只新錶。

text: We do not look very much alike and we are always interested in different things. She is not interested in anything risky.
trans: 我們看起來不太像，而且我們總是對不同的事感興趣。她對任何冒險的事都不感興趣。

text: Melody is interested in the things on sale at Sandra’s Sports Shop.
trans: Melody對Sandra運動商店拍賣的東西感興趣。

text: She has visited her married daughter in Japan three times.
trans: 她已經三度到日本拜訪她已婚的女兒。

text: The movie star does not like his family to appear in public places with him; he does not want people to know who they are.
trans: 這位電影明星不喜歡他的家人和他一起出現在公共場所；他不想讓人們知道他們是誰。

text: I do not quite understand Uncle Jim’s pictures, and he never tells us what he is trying to say with them.
trans: 我不太瞭解吉姆叔叔的畫作，而他從不告訴我們他想藉這些畫表達什麼。

text: Do you know where the library is? Just keep going for two more blocks and you’ll see it.
trans: 你知道圖書館在哪裡嗎？只要再走兩個街區，你就會看到了。

text: I really want to tell him how much I miss him.
trans: 我真的想告訴他我有多麼想念他。

text: I didn’t know what they would do to me.
trans: 我不知道他們會對我做什麼。

text: Do you know how long you have talked on the phone?
trans: 你知道你已經講了多久的電話嗎？

text: Adam wrote the letter to show how he felt about what he bought.
trans: Adam寫這封信來表達他對於所買的東西有何感想。

text: Susan could never understand why people would like to have cats or dogs in the house.
trans: Susan永遠無法瞭解為什麼有人會想在房子裡養貓或養狗。

text: The poor man’s wife was very sick. We did not know how to tell him the bad news.
trans: 這個可憐人的妻子病得很重。我們不知道要怎麼告訴他這個壞消息。

text: How about the hotel? Do you have any idea of where to stay?
trans: 飯店怎麼樣呢？你知道要在哪裡過夜嗎？

text: Even today, Lois is still wondering whether what she said to that man was right or wrong.
trans: 即使到今天，Lois仍然不知道她對那個人說的話是對的還是錯的。

text: Jacky would like to bring that poor dog back home, but he isn’t sure whether his mother likes dogs.
trans: Jacky想要把那條可憐的狗帶回家，但他不確定他媽媽喜不喜歡狗。

text: He asked Lois if she could lend him some money.
trans: 他問Lois是否可以借他一些錢。

text: On their way back to America, Bill and Jill were thinking about why they never ate rice or drank tea or ate with chopsticks.
trans: 在他們回美國的途中，Bill和Jill想著為什麼他們一直沒有吃冰、喝茶或用筷子吃東西。

text: All of us will go and pick you up at the airport except Dad.
trans: 除了老爸以外，我們全部的人都會開車到機場接你。

text: Mr. Green was very angry with his daughter because she always put her dirty socks on the dining table.
trans: Green先生很氣他女兒，因為她老是把髒襪子擺在餐桌上。

text: With the new bridge, life in this town will become more convenient.
trans: 有了這座新的橋，鎮上的生活會變得更方便。

text: She is in her third year of junior high school.
trans: 她現在國中三年級。

text: He bought a bicycle for his son as a birthday present on December 3.
trans: 十二月三日那天，他買了一部腳踏車給兒子當生日禮物。

text: He was a basketball player on our school team and was very popular with many girls.
trans: 他是籃球校隊的選手，而且受到很多女孩子的歡迎。

text: Tony and Peter are famous for their wonderful voices.
trans: Tony和Peter以他們美妙的嗓音而聞名。

text: People in this small town are quite friendly to strangers; they always try to help out when strangers are in trouble.
trans: 這座小鎮上的人們對陌生人相當友善；當陌生人有麻煩時，他們總是想辦法幫忙解決。

text: Tina is getting married to a man she has known only for a month.
trans: Tina即將嫁給一個她只認識了一個月的男人。

text: There are five stories in this book. The one about a shy police officer is the most interesting to me.
trans: 這本書裡有五篇故事。其中我覺得最有趣的一篇是關於一位害羞的警察。

text: Suddenly, one of them came up to me and tried to hurt me with a knife.
trans: 突然，他們其中一個人向我走來，想用刀子傷害我。

text: They were very worried because they couldn’t reach you by calling your cell phone.
trans: 他們很擔心，因為他們打你的手機卻聯絡不到你。

text: She said I can’t go to the movies without her before I’m fifteen.
trans: 她說在我十五歲以前，沒有她作陪我不能去看電影。

text: We offer a warm and safe place for dogs without a home.
trans: 我們為無家可歸的狗兒們提供一個溫暖而安全的地方。

text: In a loud voice, I told her I was doing my computer homework.
trans: 我很大聲地告訴她我在做我的電腦作業。

text: The boy in the cap is the cutest person in the class.
trans: 戴帽子的男孩是班上最可愛的一個。

text: Please give me some suggestions on what I should do.
trans: 我該怎麼做，請給我一些建議。

text: The city’s beautiful beaches are closed because of the typhoon.
trans: 因為颱風之故，這座城市的美麗海灘已關閉。

text: Don’t forget to brush your teeth before you go to bed. It’s important to clean them every night.
trans: 上床睡覺前別忘記刷牙。每晚清潔牙齒是很重要的。

text: It is very dangerous to play on the railway. The train may come at any time.
trans: 在鐵道上玩很危險。火車可能隨時會來。

text: It was important for Kevin to finish his homework quickly because he had to help his parents sell fruit in the night market.
trans: 很重要的是，凱文要很快把作業完成，因為他要到夜市幫忙父母親賣水果。

text: This water is too hot to drink. Let’s put some ice in it.
trans: 這水太燙不能喝。我們放些冰塊進去吧。

text: The weather was too hot for us to stay outside.
trans: 天氣太熱了，我們無法待在外面。

text: The quiet young man spent most of his life helping his parents on the farm.
trans: 這位安靜的青年，一生中大半時間都在農場上幫父母親的忙。

text: Andrew spends long hours studying every night. He is a hard-working student.
trans: Andrew每晚花很長的時間唸書。他是個用功的學生。

text: There are so many tests that she cannot relax and do the things she likes.
trans: 考試那麼多，以致於她無法放輕鬆去做自己喜歡的事。

text: I was so afraid that I started to cry.
trans: 我擔心到開始哭了起來。

text: They were so delicious that we ate too much and were too full to eat dinner.
trans: 它們是如此地美味，以致於我們吃得太多，肚子太飽而吃不下晚餐。

text: We need to be back before five so that we can go to Alice’s party.
trans: 我們要在五點以前回來，才能去參加Alice的派對。

text: When I was a student, I liked to sit in the front of the classroom so that I could see the words better on the blackboard.
trans: 我還是學生的時候，喜歡坐在教室的前面，才能把黑板上的字看得較清楚。

text: Charles wanted to borrow $1,000 from me yesterday.
trans: Charles昨天想跟我借一千元。

text: How about ten dollars for cleaning my room and five for taking out the garbage?
trans: 打掃我的房間算十塊錢，出去倒垃圾算五塊錢，如何？

text: Here you will find things that are made not only for children’s bodies but also for their minds.
trans: 你會在這裡發現某些不但是為了孩子們的身體，也是為了他們的心靈而做的事物。

text: Dad ran to the bathroom to get everyone a wet towel, and Mom told us to crawl on the floor.
trans: 爸爸跑進洗手間幫大家拿濕毛巾，媽媽告訴我們要在地板上爬行。

text: I understand that the picture does not always show the real color, but it should not be that different.
trans: 我明白圖畫不一定總是表現真實的色彩，但應該不至於差那麼多。

text: My sister does not like the jacket, 	and I don’t, either.
trans: 我妹妹不喜歡這件夾克，我也不喜歡。

text: Although the typhoon will not arrive until tomorrow, strong winds and heavy rains are here already.
trans: 雖然颱風明天才會來，強風豪雨已經到了。

text: I couldn’t believe I would not see him again.
trans: 我不敢相信我再也看不到他了。

text: At first, my bookstore’s business was not very good. But now it is doing quite well.
trans: 起初，我的書店生意不太好。但現在它營運得相當不錯。

text: This winter we have a lot of snow here, but a friend called yesterday and said that you’re still wearing T-shirts down there.
trans: 今年冬天我們這裡下了很多雪，但昨天有位朋友打電話來，說你們在南方仍然穿著T恤。

text: The little boys are now twenty-five years old and will come back home for the first time since they left ten years ago.
trans: 這些小男孩現在已經廿五歲了，離校十年以來他們將首次回家。

text: The five of them started to write their own songs and have become successful.
trans: 這五個人開始寫他們自己的歌，而且很成功。

text: Your Internet friends may be very different from what you think they are, so it could be dangerous for you to go out with them.
trans: 你的網友們可能和你所想的不一樣，所以你和他們出去可能有危險。

text: We don’t know when people started to celebrate Father’s Day for the first time. But it is clear that this holiday began a few years after the first Mother’s Day.
trans: 我們不知道人們何時第一次開始慶祝父親節。但很明顯的這個節日比第一個母親節晚了幾年才開始。

text: Joan loves reading but she does not have much money to buy books. She is happy that there is a public library right next to her house.
trans: Joan喜愛閱讀，但她沒有多少錢可以買書。她很高興她家隔壁就有一座公立圖書館。

text: Though Jack was poor and sick, he never gave up any chance to write. That is why he finally became a successful writer.
trans: 雖然Jack又窮又生病，他從不放棄任何寫作的機會。那就是他最後成為一位成功作家的原因。

text: It was an exciting moment for Mr. and Mrs. Wang when they learned that they were going to have a baby.
trans: 當王先生和王太太知道他們有了小寶寶，那是令人興奮的一刻。

text: In the afternoon, I have PE classes for different sports, and I really enjoy my time outside the classroom, running and laughing with my new friends.
trans: 下午我上體育課，有不同的運動，而且我真的很喜歡課堂以外的時間，和我的新朋友們又跑又笑。

text: The team was started by Dr. Joseph Brown in 1955 and has saved many dogs since then.
trans: 這個團隊是一九五五年由Joseph Brown博士發起的，從那時候起已經拯救了許多狗。

text: You don’t understand how much you have hurt her. I think she is waiting for you to say you are sorry.
trans: 你不明白你傷害她有多深。我想她在等你說聲對不起。

text: I know you love her, and I hope things can go well between the two of you.
trans: 我知道你愛她，我希望你們兩人之間一切順利。

text: They learned that most people in Taiwan eat rice, drink tea, and take off their shoes when they go into a friend’s apartment.
trans: 他們知道了大部份台灣人吃米飯，喝茶，並且進入朋友公寓時會脫鞋。
